content: Can we assume that the casing of the last part of Profile URLs has to match the name of the profile including casing? For instance, http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationRequest is the URL for MedicationRequest, while http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/evinance-medicationrequest would be wrong for a profile called Evinance-MedicationRequest?
The suffix of the url must match the StructureDefinition.id in a case-sensitive way. It doesn't matter what the name is.
